notes: Provides vision and True Sight within the area.
The visual effect created at the target area is visible to both teams.
The sound is audible to both teams through the Fog of War.
abilities.description: Reveal a target 800 area of the map for 6 seconds.

additionalInformation: Increases most heroes' day/night vision to a total of 2150/1150 range.
name: Seer Stone
description: The curious creation of a wizard who professed to hail from another time.
